line_1: Bid nations leagu'd against thee stand aloof,
line_2: Giv'n thee his blessing on the clearest proof,
Your Friendship has been Tempest Proof.

line_1: No timid heart is kept aloof;
Bears with slow step his beauteous prize aloof,
line_2: Dips in the lucid flood his ivory hoof;

line_1: While with vast strides and bristling hair aloof
line_2: Pale Danger glides along the falling roof;

line_1: With chemic art four favour'd youths aloof
line_2: Stain the white fleece, or stretch the tinted woof;

line_1: Gay Gnomes in glittering circles stand aloof
line_2: Beneath a spreading mushroom's fretted roof;
"Still will we on, and dare the proof. "

line_1: God stood not, though he seem'd to stand aloof,
line_2: And at this hour the conqu'ror feels the proof.

line_1: Now near him snarles, now barks aloof;
line_2: Away he scowers, assaults his hoof,
